subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Three Hall of Fame coaches have been chosen to receive the inaugural Joe Lapchick Character Award. Pat Summitt, Lou Carnesecca and Dean Smith will receive the award next month at Madison Square Garden. The award, conceived by Gus Alfieri, a former St. John’s player and a longtime high school coach, was established to recognize basketball coaches who have shown the character and coaching ability of the Hall of Famer Lapchick, who coached St. John’s and the Knicks.
